body_html: matrix_inverse was recently changed so it will try to use Cholesky if the matrix is symmetric, in the interest of speed. However for the log determinant, I agree that a Cholesky gradient would be nice to have.
body_text: matrix_inverse was recently changed so it will try to use Cholesky if the matrix is symmetric, in the interest of speed. However for the log determinant, I agree that a Cholesky gradient would be nice to have.
body: matrix_inverse was recently changed so it will try to use Cholesky if the matrix is symmetric, in the interest of speed. However for the log determinant, I agree that a Cholesky gradient would be nice to have.
